report.title: Euphoria That Doesn't Just Last a Few Hours
report.author: Count Orlok
report.bodytext: Having tried just about every opiate I could ever get my hands on I'd always wanted to experience methadone. I chewed a 10 mg tablet and waited for maybe an hour and a half to get high. I think 10 mgs is a good starting dose for someone that has no opiate tolerance. /n /n 12 hours later I still have a buzz. I can't see how this isn't a more prevalent street drug.
